scenario: Agent A, a dedicated runner, just finished up a long day at work from home. Exhausted, yet desiring to keep up with his scheduled routine, he prepares to head out for an evening run. It's a mild summer night and the sun is starting to set. Agent B, who is A's housemate and has just returned home from their own job as a firefighter, leans against the kitchen counter watching A lace up his running shoes.
